content.raw:
Eliminating the `dlclose` call fixes the tests. I don't know whether that is a good idea or not.
~~~
diff -r 60877ae3be5e gazebo/common/Plugin.hh
--- a/gazebo/common/Plugin.hh	Fri Jan 24 11:37:13 2014 -0800
+++ b/gazebo/common/Plugin.hh	Tue Jan 28 17:38:35 2014 -0800
@@ -84,7 +84,9 @@
     public: virtual ~PluginT()
             {
 #ifdef HAVE_DL
+#ifndef __APPLE__
               dlclose(this->dlHandle);
+#endif  // ifndef __APPLE
 #endif
             }
 
~~~
